name: House Plant
unsettling_description: The small flower buds have a sweet, heady aroma.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: The underside of each leaf is oddly sticky.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: Feed me, Seymour!
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: Exists in symbiosis with a colony of ants. The plant's stems are crawling with them.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: The edges of its broad leaves are razor-sharp.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: Transporting this species across government borders carries a hefty fine.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: It doesn't trust you to water it.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: House Plant
unsettling_description: The lush potted grass provides a good hiding spot for illicit items.
original_description: Adds some character to your home or farm.

name: Scarecrow
unsettling_description: A miracle of modern taxidermy.
original_description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a limited radius (about 8 "tiles").

name: Lightning Rod
unsettling_description: Packages the immense energy of lightning storms in a convenient format.
original_description: Collects energy from lightning storms and turns it into battery packs.

name: Bee House
unsettling_description: Cute bee vomit factories for your farm. Harvest from enslaved insects in every season but winter.
original_description: Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).

name: Keg
unsettling_description: The liquid inside burbles and sloshes even when no one is near the barrel.
original_description: Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.

name: Furnace
unsettling_description: Turns ore and coal into metal bars. Is it big enough to fit a person inside?
original_description: Turns ore and coal into metal bars.

name: Preserves Jar
unsettling_description: Preserves food long beyond its best-by date.
original_description: Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.

name: Cheese Press
unsettling_description: Congeals microbe-riddled mammary liquids into a solidified mass.
original_description: Turns milk into cheese.

name: Loom
unsettling_description: Turns stolen sheep fur into fabric!
original_description: Turns raw wool into fine cloth.

name: Oil Maker
unsettling_description: Squeezes the fat from organic materials to make lubricant. The mayor appreciates its work.
original_description: Makes gourmet truffle oil.

name: Recycling Machine
unsettling_description: A dark enchantment on this machine defies the laws of entropy.
original_description: Turns fishing trash into resources.

name: Crystalarium
unsettling_description: Advanced replicator technology. For better or for worse, it only works on shiny rocks.
original_description: Insert a gem of your choice and it will grow copies.

name: Table Piece L
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: The left side of a big table.

name: Table Piece R
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: The right side of a big table

name: Mayonnaise Machine
unsettling_description: Pulverizes unborn critters and blends them with oil to make sandwich spread.
original_description: Turns eggs into mayonnaise.

name: Seed Maker
unsettling_description: Sucks the life from your crops so you can grow them anew.
original_description: Place crops inside to produce a varying amount of seeds. Doesn't work with fruit tree crops.

name: Wood Chair
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: A chair that can be oriented in 4 different ways.

name: Wood Chair
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: A chair that can be oriented in 4 different ways.

name: Skeleton Model
unsettling_description: A freshly harvested skeleton. Makes a useful tool for learning anatomy.
original_description: A model of a skeleton.

name: Obelisk
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: A sinister-looking portal that radiates with evil energy.

name: Chicken Statue
unsettling_description: Flammable.
original_description: A wooden statue of a chicken.

name: Stone Cairn
unsettling_description: Stones like these are often used as burial monuments.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Suit Of Armor
unsettling_description: Purely decorative. There's no one inside... wait...
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Sign Of The Vessel
unsettling_description: Using this as decoration would be dangerous blasphemy.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Basic Log
unsettling_description: Some poor tree's midriff.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Lawn Flamingo
unsettling_description: Unusually life-like. The material seems artificial, but you can't be sure.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Wood Sign
unsettling_description: Use an item on it to trap the item's image inside. The item won't be consumed.
original_description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.

name: Stone Sign
unsettling_description: Use an item on it to trap the item's image inside. The item won't be consumed.
original_description: Use an item on this to change what's displayed. The item won't be consumed.

name: Big Green Cane
unsettling_description: Full-grown. This species takes two winters to become sexually mature.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

unsettling_description: Juvenile green candy canes.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Mixed Cane
unsettling_description: Half-breeds!
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Red Canes
unsettling_description: Juvenile red candy canes.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

unsettling_description: Viciously attacks when it thinks its young canes are threatened.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

unsettling_description: Decorative animal fodder.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Log Section
unsettling_description: Count the rings to learn how old this tree had grown before being killed.
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Grave Stone
unsettling_description: It's best not to ask where this came from...
original_description: A decorative piece for your farm.

name: Seasonal Decor
unsettling_description: It changes form every season, but you're not sure how.
original_description: This decoration changes with the seasons.

name: Garden Pot

original_description: Grows crops from any season when indoors. Outdoors, it can only house seasonal crops.

name: Wicked Statue

original_description: Something's not right with this statue.

name: Sloth Skeleton L
unsettling_description: Gunther said it was a sloth, but you're not so sure...
original_description: This extinct sloth roamed the lush, prehistoric forests of Stardew Valley. Its powerful jaw tore through the toughest plant fibers.

name: Sloth Skeleton M
unsettling_description: When you look closely, the bones don't all seem to match.
original_description: The ribs of a prehistoric sloth.

name: Sloth Skeleton R
unsettling_description: Ugh, the pelvic bone looks oddly human.
original_description: The hind legs and tail of a prehistoric sloth.

name: Standing Geode
unsettling_description: The inside is covered in jagged crystals, with a hollow space large enough to enclose a small child.
original_description: It's a huge geode mounted on a stand. Hundreds of purple crystals shimmer within.

name: Obsidian Vase
unsettling_description: If you put your whole arm inside, you might be able to reach the bottom.
original_description: A beautifully crafted ornamental vase made from obsidian and gold.

name: Crystal Chair
unsettling_description: Thin cracks suggest it's been shattered once before. You're not sure how safe this is.
original_description: A fancy, delicate chair made from crystals.

name: Singing Stone
unsettling_description: Emits a captivating melody. The longer you listen, the harder it is to move away.
original_description: It rings out with a pure tone when struck.

name: Stone Owl
unsettling_description: No matter where you go, you can feel a pair of eyes watching your every movement.
original_description: It's not clear where this came from, but it looks very fine.

name: Strange Capsule
unsettling_description: ALREADY UNSETTLING
original_description: There's something fleshy bobbing around in the fluid...

name: Empty Capsule
unsettling_description: Wh... where did the thing go that was inside it?
original_description: Part of the glass is shattered.

name: Feed Hopper

name: Incubator
unsettling_description: NON-INVENTORY
original_description: Hatches eggs into baby chickens and ducks.

name: Heater
unsettling_description: Should be serviced regularly to avoid risk of sudden fire or explosions.
original_description: Keeps your animals warmer and happier during the winter.

name: Tapper
unsettling_description: A handy tool to drain the life out of trees!
original_description: Place on a maple, oak, or pine tree and wait for the reservoir to fill with product!

name: Camera
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE

unsettling_description: The flowers are so fragrant, they mask all other odors.

unsettling_description: Ugh, this empty barrel smells like something has crawled into it and died!

name: Prairie King Arcade System
unsettling_description: PARENTAL ADVISORY: may cause fits of frustration-induced violence.
original_description: Play 'Journey Of The Prairie King' at home!

name: Wooden Brazier
unsettling_description: Fends off the terrors of the night. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Stone Brazier
unsettling_description: Suitable for burnt offerings. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Gold Brazier
unsettling_description: A testament to your vanity. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Campfire
unsettling_description: Don't leave it unattended.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Stump Brazier
unsettling_description: Only you can prevent forest fires. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

unsettling_description: A wooden masterpiece to burn. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Skull Brazier
unsettling_description: No, this isn't a real skull... probably. Provides moderate light.
original_description: Provides a moderate amount of light.

name: Barrel Brazier
unsettling_description: A fire in a wooden barrel sounds safe. Provides moderate light.

name: Marble Brazier

name: Wood Lamp-post

name: Iron Lamp-post

original_description: Provides a good amount of light.

name: Worm Bin
unsettling_description: Produces bait. Close the lid to give the worms some privacy.
original_description: Produces bait on a regular basis. The worms are self-sufficient.

name: Slime Incubator
unsettling_description: Brings writhing, oozing creatures to life. Place slime eggs inside to hatch them.
original_description: Hatches slimes eggs into slimes. Allows you to raise slimes outdoors.

name: Slime Egg-Press
unsettling_description: Compresses slaughtered slime remains into a new life form.
original_description: Compresses 100 pieces of slime into a slime egg. It's a miracle of science!

name: Junimo Kart Arcade System
unsettling_description: The reward for thy suffering is more suffering.
original_description: Play 'Junimo Kart' at home!

name: Cask
unsettling_description: Stuff it with fermented fruits or congealed milk products to ripen them with age. Use in the cellar.
original_description: Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.

name: Solid Gold Lewis
unsettling_description: This statue would look good in purple shorts.
original_description: Mayor's secret project.

name: Auto-Grabber
unsettling_description: You've never seen it move, yet it somehow collects everything each morning...
original_description: Automatically harvests from your animals each morning. Must be placed inside a coop or barn.

name: Deluxe Scarecrow
unsettling_description: An aggregation of trapped souls, hostile enough to drive thieving creatures away from a distance (about 16 "tiles").
original_description: Prevents crows from attacking your crops. Has a large radius (about 16 "tiles").

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: Feeds on your exhaled breath.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: Dies and grows back every year, but it never seems to need water.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: This artificial plant somehow changes with the seasons.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: It's happiest in the hot sun of the desert.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: An invasive species, this shrub causes colony collapse disorder in local bee populations.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Seasonal Plant
unsettling_description: Seasonal. Keep away from pets.
original_description: An ornamental plant that changes with each season. It doesn't need to be watered.

name: Workbench
unsettling_description: It's well taken care of, but you can never clean the blood out from the cracks in the wood.
original_description: When crafting here, you'll have access to materials in any adjacent chests.

name: Mini-Jukebox
unsettling_description: Supposedly battery-powered, but the power source never seems to need replacement.
original_description: Allows you to play your favorite tunes.

name: Wood Chipper
unsettling_description: Breaks things down into tiny pieces. Meant for hardwood, but maybe a body would fit...
original_description: Insert a piece of hardwood to break it down into regular wood.

name: Mini-Fridge
unsettling_description: Not big enough for meat. Storing crops and forage ingredients will have to do.
original_description: Allows you to store additional ingredients for cooking.

name: Cursed P.K. Arcade System
unsettling_description: UNOBTAINABLE
original_description: Something's not right with this Prairie King Arcade System...
